title: 213: Tayshia’s Bachelorette FINALE: We Gush. We Sob. We LIVE!
itunes:title: 213: Tayshia’s Bachelorette FINALE: We Gush. We Sob. We LIVE!
description:
Broad Squad, what a season!! The Broads recap the final episode of Tayshia’s season of The Bachelorette and it is pretty much an emotional gush-fest. Don’t want to spoil anything in the notes but - they have A LOT of feelings!


***Join The Broads on Monday January 4th to go over Matt James’ contestant’s cast bios and then Tuesday January 5th to recap Matt’s 1st episode as The Bachelor! 


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS: 

***HAWTHORNE: Go to HAWTHORNE.CO and use promo code CHATTY to get 10% off your first purchase!

***SOLITAIRE GRAND HARVEST: Download Solitaire Grand Harvest for free today and in the Apple App Store, Google Play and Amazon!

***FUNCTION OF BEAUTY:  Go to FUNCTIONOFBEAUTY.COM/BROADS to take your quiz and save 20% off on your first hair care order!

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ
